changeSet.createView: SELECT rel.id, rel.name, rel.description, inv.name AS inverse, rel.notes, up.name AS updated_by, w.name AS workspace, wa.key AS wsp_key, wa.description AS wsp_desc, rel.version FROM existential rel JOIN existential inv ON rel.inverse = inv.id JOIN existential up ON rel.updated_by = up.id LEFT JOIN workspace_label wa ON wa.reference = rel.id LEFT JOIN existential w ON wa.workspace = w.id WHERE rel.domain = 'Relationship'
